product_name: LifeProof Cover/Stand for the iPad 2/3/4 nuud Case
long_description: The LifeProof Cover/Stand for the iPad(R) 2/3/4 nuud Case helps protect your iPad when it's not in use or when you're on the go. Doubles as a stand for watching movies or angling your iPad at the optimal typing position. Note: the LifeProof Cover/Stand can only be used in conjunction with the LifeProof nuud case (sold separately).
short_description: The LifeProof Cover/Stand for the iPad(R) 2/3/4 nuud Case helps protect your iPad when it's not in use or when you're on the go.
